text: إِذۡ تَبَرَّأَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتُّبِعُواْ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّبَعُواْ وَرَأَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ وَتَقَطَّعَتۡ بِهِمُ ٱلۡأَسۡبَابُ

translation.en: [And they should consider that] when those who have been followed disassociate themselves from those who followed [them], and they [all] see the punishment, and cut off from them are the ties [of relationship]
translation.id: (Yaitu) ketika orang-orang yang diikuti berlepas tangan dari orang-orang yang mengikuti, dan mereka melihat azab, dan (ketika) segala hubungan antara mereka terputus
